source: 211 Connecticut, Connecticut Department of Veterans Affairs, Community Renewal Team

resources.name: 211 Connecticut
resources.description: Connecticut's free information and referral service providing 24/7 access to knowledgeable multilingual staff connecting veterans and families to community resources including housing, employment, mental health, and benefits support

resources.name: Connecticut Department of Veterans Affairs (CT DVA)
resources.description: State department providing advocacy and claims assistance for federal VA and state VA benefits. Multiple district offices throughout Connecticut.

resources.name: CT DVA Veteran Services Support Center
resources.description: Central support center for veteran services and advocacy assistance

resources.name: Community Renewal Team - Supportive Services for Veteran Families
resources.description: Provides supportive services, case management, and financial assistance including rent, utilities, and security deposits for veterans and families

resources.name: Connecticut Veterans Home and Hospital
resources.description: State facility providing medical and rehabilitative care, substance abuse treatment, transitional living, and educational and employment services for eligible wartime veterans

resources.name: Columbus House - Veterans Services New Haven
resources.description: Provides housing and support services for 14 homeless male veterans, connecting them to services and expanding their social and employment skills

resources.name: Anne Mosher - Veterans Service Officer (Third District)
resources.description: Municipal Veterans Service Officer providing advocacy and benefits assistance for third district veterans (includes New Haven area)

resources.name: VFW New Haven Post 12150 - Veteran Resources
resources.description: Veterans of Foreign Wars post providing veteran resources, programs, and community support

resources.name: Hartford VA Regional Benefit Office
resources.description: Federal VA office administering compensation, pension, education, and housing benefits for Connecticut veterans

resources.name: Veterans Crisis Line
resources.description: 24/7 free confidential crisis support for veterans and families experiencing mental health crises, PTSD, suicidal thoughts
